document_data.name: Soul Eater
document_data.mainbody: '''''Soul eater''''' was an [[arcane]] [[necromancy]] [[spell]] that damaged creatures and made use of their life essence.
document_data.Effects: When cast, ''soul eater'' damaged all living creatures in a {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} radius. Only those that died as a result would have their life essence exploited. In such a case, the creatures would be transformed into [[skeleton]]s that fought for the caster. The caster themself also became much stronger, more robust, and more dexterous, proportional to how many enemies killed from the original casting of ''soul eater''.
